name: Gel Ink Pens Set
description: Set of smooth gel ink pens in assorted colors, perfect for writing, note-taking, and journaling.

name: Classic Wooden Pencils
description: Pack of classic wooden pencils with HB lead, ideal for sketching, drawing, and writing.

name: Fine Point Markers Set
description: Set of fine point markers in vibrant colors, great for coloring, highlighting, and labeling.

name: Rollerball Pens Pack
description: Pack of rollerball pens with smooth ink flow and quick-drying properties, suitable for writing and drawing.

name: Calligraphy Pen Set
description: Set of calligraphy pens with assorted nib sizes, perfect for creating elegant lettering and decorative scripts.

name: Fountain Pen
description: Classic fountain pen with a stainless steel nib and refillable ink cartridge, ideal for formal writing and signatures.

name: Mechanical Pencils Set
description: Set of mechanical pencils with retractable lead and built-in erasers, convenient for precise writing and sketching.

name: Highlighter Pens Set
description: Set of highlighter pens in assorted neon colors, perfect for emphasizing important text and notes.

name: Whiteboard Markers Set
description: Set of whiteboard markers with low-odor, non-toxic ink, suitable for writing and drawing on whiteboards and dry erase surfaces.

name: Graphite Drawing Pencils Set
description: Set of graphite drawing pencils with assorted lead hardness grades, ideal for sketching, shading, and technical drawing.
